name: Raven, Swarm of Ravens
description: A swarm of tiny ravens that can move through spaces and occupy other creatures' spaces, creating chaotic situations in battles.
memorable: The swarm can steal spell components, disrupting magic users effectively.
goals: Typically scavenging for carrion and disrupting opponents.
relations: May accompany other carrion-feeding creatures or undead.
environment: Often found in areas with dead creatures or battlefields.
strengths: High stealth ability and resistance to various damage types.
weaknesses: Relatively low hit points and reliance on swarm tactics.
attacks: Attacks with beaks, causing piercing damage, scaling based on health.
most_powerful_ability: Pilfering Swarm disrupts spellcasting by stealing components.
senses: Good perception score of 13 allows it to detect carrion effectively.
skills: Good at stealth, making it hard to detect.
additional_information: Can occupy the space of other creatures.
Immune to several conditions, making it tough in combat.
Cannot regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.
Carrion Sense helps locate dead bodies within 60 feet.
Swarm tactics create unique strategic challenges.
